name: User Input & Visual Feedback
goal: Enable player to make guesses and see feedback on the map

prds.description: County input field with placeholder 'Guess a county...'
steps: Verify input field is visible in game panel
Verify placeholder text shows 'Guess a county...'
prds.automatedTest: P3.1 - Input field exists with placeholder

prds.description: Autocomplete dropdown showing matching counties (excludes already guessed)
steps: Verify dropdown appears with 'Cork' as option
Verify dropdown shows Dublin, Donegal, Derry, Down
Verify Dublin is no longer in dropdown

prds.description: Keyboard navigation for autocomplete (arrow keys, Enter, Escape)
steps: Press down arrow to highlight first option
Press down arrow again to move to second option
prds.manualTest: Keyboard navigation implemented in event listeners

steps: Verify submit button is visible next to input

prds.description: Process guess: validate, calculate distance/direction/color, update map
steps: Verify guess is added to gameState.guesses
Verify color is assigned based on proximity

prds.description: Color the guessed county on SVG map with proximity color
steps: Verify the county path on SVG map changes color
Verify new county also changes color

prds.description: Guess counter display (6 visual slots that fill with guess colors)
steps: Verify first slot fills with guess color
Verify second slot fills with that guess color
